entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 11:00 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 7.7°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:15 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except east 30 km/h near the water. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:15 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
